text:
@SecPompeo @WHO I had monitored the Weibo during the Lunar New Year period and found that there were hundreds of posts calling for help everyday since there were no treatment to the patients of the #coronavirus in Wuhan
So the actual numbers of infected disclosed by the #CCP must not be accurate
